title: Christmas Gift Guide 2018: Gifts for kids | Trusted Reviews
description:
![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Let’s face it: kids are really fun to shop for. They’re not always easy though
- so we’re here to hep ease the journey.

We have picks for kids of all ages, and all budgets, whether you’re looking
for a gift they can enjoy on their own, or one they can share with the family.

## Gifts under £20 for kids

### [LEGO The Incredibles 2 Juniors **£19.99**](https://amzn.to/2zjJvGJ)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2zjJvGJ)

For kids that are two old for Duplo and not quite ready for the full blown
LEGO experience, there’s LEGO Juniors – who have created some fantastic sets
based on this year’s Pixar hit, Incredibles 2. There are three sets in total,
showing different scenes from the film, with each including different
characters. They’re simple enough for young kids to assemble, but that should
stop you from helping out. After all, when you’re tired of LEGO, you’re tired
of life.

  * **Read our[LEGO The Incredibles 2 Juniors review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/lego-incredibles-2-juniors)**
  * [**Buy LEGO The Incredibles 2 Juniors from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2zjJvGJ)

### [Slime Rancher **£16.95**](https://amzn.to/2CUwC9r)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CUwC9r)

A gentle, but strangely compelling video game, Slime Rancher sees players
running a ranch on a distant planet. That ranch caters to – you guessed it –
slime. There are several different varieties of slime that the player farms,
by sucking them into a vacuum gun, and ejecting into the appropriate pen. The
game is brightly coloured but relaxing to play, mixing the fun of farming the
odd, gelatinous creatures with the strategy of farm upkeep.

  * **Read our[Slime Rancher review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/slime-rancher) **
  * [**Buy Slime Rancher from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CUwC9r)

### [LEGO Dimensions, Doctor Who **£13.75**](https://amzn.to/2CVwKWn)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CVwKWn)

## Gifts under £50 for kids

### [Dragon Ball FighterZ **£36.5** **0**](https://amzn.to/2AGVwYG)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2AGVwYG)

A brilliant tag-team fighting game based on the cartoon, Dragon Ball FighterZ
is a great option for kids who are maybe a bit too young for the edgier
fighting games, like Soul Calibur. The game also has a nice feature that lets
characters waiting on the sideline assist those in the thick of the fray.
Available for play on Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PS4.

  * **Read our[Dragon Ball FighterZ review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/dragon-ball-fighterz-switch)**
  * [**Buy Dragon Ball FighterZ from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2AGVwYG)

### [Camel Up **£25. 19**](https://amzn.to/2CQXvLD)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CQXvLD)

A gift that doubles as a Christmas Day activity is always a great idea, so
this madcap adventure board game is ideal. The game suits up to 8 players, so
the whole family can join in – competing against each other over a dramatic
camel race around the pyramids.

  * **Read more about[Camel Up and our top picks for toys](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-toys)**
  * [**Buy Camel Up from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CQXvLD)

### [NERF Zombie Strike Doominator **£29.99**](https://amzn.to/2PBVuJQ)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2PBVuJQ)

One of the beefier NERF Guns available, the Zombie Strike Doominator boasts a
dart capacity of 24, across four different cylinders. It’ll definitely give
the kid in your life an edge when it comes to NERF battles, so make sure
you’re equipped to defend yourself. As an added bonus it’s called the
“Doominator” which is incredibly fun to say.

  * **Read our[NERF Zombie Strike Doominator review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nerf-zombie-strike-doominator)**
  * [**Buy a NERF Zombie Strike Doominator from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2PBVuJQ)

## Gifts under £100 for kids

## [Beasts of Balance **£60.00**](https://amzn.to/2Dh4a2O)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2Dh4a2O)

For something that really captures the imagination try Beasts of Balance. A
board game that combines video game elements and uses block stacking to create
fantastical creatures, in a colourful and imaginative game. It may seem simple
at first, but there’s more to it than meets the eye – and it just keeps
getting better. The developers recently added a 2-3 player competitive mode,
and there are expansion packs that let you build on the game.

  * **Read our[Beasts of Balance review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/beasts-of-balance)**
  * [**Buy Beasts of Balance from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2Dh4a2O)

### [Harry Potter Kano Coding Kit **£99.99**](https://amzn.to/2CTySho)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CTySho)

For a little education in your play, the Harry Potter Kano Coding Kit is
great. The kit uses a battery powered wand along with an app to teach kids the
basics of programming. To add to the magic, the kit is strikingly presented,
doing its best to make kids feel like they’ve had a delivery straight from
Olivanders.

  * **Read our[Harry Potter Kano Coding Kit review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/harry-potter-kano-coding-kit)**
  * [**Buy a Harry Potter Kano Coding Kit from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CTySho)

### [Nintendo Labo **£54.99**](https://amzn.to/2AFYJba)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2AFYJba)

Nintendo Labo is technically made for kids, but you may be tempted to steel it
yourself. It takes the motion control elements of the Nintendo Switch to the
next level, buy combining the console with expertly designed cardboard plates
– in a dizzying variety of ways. There are several kits available, and each
contains several kits – including buildable pianos, cars, fishing rods, and
robots. It’s a truly magical mix of video game and craftwork that promises
endless fun.

  * **Read our[Nintendo Labo review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nintendo-labo)**
  * [**Buy a Nintendo Labo from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2AFYJba)

## Gifts under £200 for kids

### [Sphero SPRK+ **£110.41**](https://amzn.to/2CVeSuA)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CVeSuA)

Another toy/coding teacher, the Sphere SPRK+ is an app controlled robot that
can be controlled with custom written programs – teaching kids coding that
works across several platforms. There are ready to run programmes, easy to
follow tutorials, and even coding challenges to give things a competitive
edge.

  * **Read our[Sphero SPRK+ review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sphero-sprk)**
  * [**Buy a Sphero SPRK+ from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CVeSuA)

### [Feber Darewa **£154.49**](https://amzn.to/2P4Ledy)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2P4Ledy)

Forget ridable toy cars, it’s time for toy Segways. The Feber Dareway is a
battery powered standing transporter with a racy design, and racier turns.
While it doesn’t have the control or the battery life needed for real
transport, it’s great fun as a backyard toy, with spinning energetic turns.

  * **Read our[Feber Darewa review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/feber-dareway)**
  * [**Buy a Feber Darewa from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2P4Ledy)

### [Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Edition **£199.99**](https://amzn.to/2zmpPlx)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2zmpPlx)

We live in tablet time now and the Amazon Fire Kids Edition is an excellent
option for parents wanting to take advantage of all the education and
entertainment options that allows. It comes complete with a sturdy rubber
surrounding to protect the tablet, and provides an easy to operate, secure
operating system – that even lets you control how much time it’s used each
day.

  * **Read our[Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Edition review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/amazon-fire-hd-10-kids-edition)**
  * [**Buy a Amazon Fire HD 10 Kids Edition from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2zmpPlx)

## Expensive gifts for kids

### [LEGO Creator Expert Roller Coaster **£366.57**](https://amzn.to/2AEZEs5)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2AEZEs5)

This is a gift that begs for the adults to get involved – the build is massive
and intricate, so only older kids will able to manage alone. But it’s all the
better for being a family effort, becoming a fun, unified activity you can
devote a lazy afternoon to. And the build’s only the beginning – at the end
you’re left with an incredibly detailed set that really runs. You can even add
LEGO Boost or LEGO Power options to get it running automatically.

  * **Read our[LEGO Creator Expert Roller Coaster review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/lego-creator-expert-roller-coaster)**
  * [**Buy a LEGO Creator Expert Roller Coaster from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2AEZEs5)

### [Anki Vector **£249.99**](https://amzn.to/2P2bZj8)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2P2bZj8)

An adorable robot, the Anki Vector may not be quite as good as having you’re
own R2D2 but it comes pretty close. An upgrade from the Anki Cozmo – which was
a best seller on its release – the Vector responds in English, influenced by
the way you talk to smart home tech, like Alexa, or Apple’s Siri. The robot is
small enough to fit in your hand, it makes for a sweet, futuristic robot
friend.

  * **Read our[Anki Vector review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/anki-vector)**
  * [**Buy a Anki Vector from Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2P2bZj8)
